addDamage

public void addDamage(java.lang.Integer damage)
Adds the specified damage value to the current teddy. Checks also if the teddy is dead from now on and notifies all listeners of that fact if so.

Parameters:
damage - Positive value as it is the damage to the teddy

Get the public key from the server for encryption reasons.
